description: This programme is focused on the promotion of Job Creation and Sustainable Livelihoods; develoment of capacity for economic management; Enhancement of Medium, Small Scale Enterprises and financial intermediation.

This programme is focused on the promotion of Job Creation and Sustainable Livelihoods; develoment of capacity for economic management; Enhancement of Medium, Small Scale Enterprises and financial intermediation.1. Training for improving service delivery for SME operators undertaken
